DataElement.preferredName: Serious Adverse Event Report Submission Descriptive Short Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Short description of the category of expedited report to be submitted to caAERS.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information relating to a serious adverse event report._A short textual account; having provided a short account._Something submitted for the judgment or consideration of others.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Causing fear or anxiety by threatening great harm; of great consequence.:Any unfavorable and unintended sign (including an abnormal laboratory finding), symptom, syndrome, or disease, temporally associated with the use of a medical product or procedure, regardless of whether or not it is considered related to the product or procedure (attribution of unrelated, unlikely, possible, probable, or definite). The concept refers to events that could be medical product related, dose related, route related, patient related, caused by an interaction with another therapy or procedure, or caused by opioid initiation or dose escalation. The term also is referred to as an adverse experience. The old term Side Effect is retired and should not be used.

Concepts.definition: Causing fear or anxiety by threatening great harm; of great consequence.

Any unfavorable or unintended disease, sign, or symptom (including an abnormal laboratory finding) that is temporally associated with the use of a medical treatment or procedure, and that may or may not be considered related to the medical treatment or procedure. Such events can be related to the intervention, dose, route of administration, patient, or caused by an interaction with another drug(s) or procedure(s).

Property.preferredDefinition: A short textual account; having provided a short account.:Something submitted for the judgment or consideration of others.

Concepts.definition: A short textual account; having provided a short account.
Something submitted for the judgment or consideration of others.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition:
any unfavorable symptoms, signs, or disease temporally associated with the use of a medical
treatment or procedure that may or may not be considered related to the medical
treatment or procedure.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Abbreviated or shortened text field to describe an activity, topic, or item.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Description; a statement that represents something in words.:Having little (physical) length or seeming to be limited in (temporal) duration.:Text; the words of something written.

Concepts.definition: A written or verbal account, representation, statement, or explanation of something.
Having little (physical) length or seeming to be limited in (temporal) duration.
